original: gsung gi dbang phyug 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: nang gi mtshan mo bshes bral gyi //
analyzed: nang gi mtshan mo bshes bral gyi //

original: nang gi nyin byed thub pa ni //
analyzed: nang gi nyin byed thub pa ni //

original: snang ba mchog gi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: snang ba mchog gi bdag nyid can //
translated: Possessing the nature of supreme illumination.

original: rgyal ba nyi ma la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rgyal ba nyi ma la phyag 'tshal //

original: rang gi snyan ngag dang gzhan gyi snyan ngag rnams la ji ltar bya ba bye brag tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir bstan bcos brtsam mo //
analyzed: rang gi snyan ngag dang gzhan gyi snyan ngag rnams la ji ltar bya ba bye brag tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir bstan bcos brtsam mo //
translated: In order to specifically understand what should be done with regard to one's own poetry and the poetry of others, one should compose a treatise.

original: de la dmar ser gyi sdeb sbyor rtsa ba'i mdo dang de'i dper brjod ni rgyal ba'i lhas mdzad do //
analyzed: de la dmar ser gyi sdeb sbyor rtsa ba'i mdo dang de'i dper brjod ni rgyal ba'i lhas mdzad do //
translated: Regarding that, the root text and examples of the red and yellow prosody were composed by Jayadeva.

original: de dag gis mdzad du zin kyang de yon brgyad rnams kyis shin tu dben par gyur te /
analyzed: de dag gis mdzad du zin kyang de yon brgyad rnams kyis shin tu dben par gyur te /
translated: Even though they were composed by him, they are extremely devoid of the eight qualities.

original: de ltar ni de la pr'ast'a ra la sogs pa rnams la mdor bsdu ba med pa dang / lci yang gi ming la sogs pa rnams la tshigs su bcad pas ma bcings pa dang / phal cher mi gsal ba nyid dang / ngo mtshar ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa yang ma mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar ni de la pr'ast'a ra la sogs pa rnams la mdor bsdu ba med pa dang / lci yang gi ming la sogs pa rnams la tshigs su bcad pas ma bcings pa dang / phal cher mi gsal ba nyid dang / ngo mtshar ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa yang ma mdzad pa dang /
translated: mostly no clarity, and no teaching of wondrous composition.

original: ngal bso dang / lus dang / ming gi ming 'dres pa dang sla ba yang med do //
analyzed: ngal bso dang / lus dang / ming gi ming 'dres pa dang sla ba yang med do //
translated: There is no rest, no body, no mixing of the name of the name, and no ease.

original: dper na / ra dza dag rma bya'i 'gros so //
analyzed: dper na / ra dza dag rma bya'i 'gros so //
translated: For example, rajadag is the gait of a peacock.

original: de nas rag dag go //
analyzed: de nas rag dag go //
translated: Then, ragdak.

original: nor dang chu gter la ngal bso ba'i na dag sbyor ba ste /ğŸ”½ma ya dag go //
analyzed: nor dang chu gter la ngal bso ba'i na dag sbyor ba ste / ma ya dag go //
translated: The application of resting and water treasure is maya.

original: dz'a ti tsa la sogs pa'i sgo yis 'byed pa ni snga ma rnams kyi bzhed pa'o zhes pa ni sbyor ba'i rim pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dz'a ti tsa la sogs pa'i sgo yis 'byed pa ni snga ma rnams kyi bzhed pa'o zhes pa ni sbyor ba'i rim pa med pa'o //
translated: Jati and so on are opened by the door. This is the assertion of the former. This is the absence of the sequence of application.

original: ro langs can ni ra lag phyi ma'o zhes pa la sogs pa'ang 'don sla ba med do //
analyzed: ro langs can ni ra lag phyi ma'o zhes pa la sogs pa'ang 'don sla ba med do //
translated: Vetala is the latter ragalag and so on. This is also the absence of ease in recitation.

original: ngal bso dang tshogs dag kyang mi mnyam par bcad pa ste /
analyzed: ngal bso dang tshogs dag kyang mi mnyam par bcad pa ste /

original: de'i phyir tshogs kyi mthar ngal bso ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs kyi mthar ngal bso ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no rest at the end of the collection.

original: 'di la yon tan brgyad po 'di rnams kyang yod cing /
analyzed: 'di la yon tan brgyad po 'di rnams kyang yod cing /
translated: And these eight qualities are present in it.

original: slar dper brjod kyang mdo yis so //
analyzed: slar dper brjod kyang mdo yis so //
translated: And there is an example from the sutra.

original: de'i phyir 'di de bas kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di de bas kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is even more excellent.

original: yang 'dir tshigs su bcad par gyur na /
analyzed: yang 'dir tshigs su bcad par gyur na /
translated: And if it becomes a verse here,ğŸ”½The qualities are: a clear verse in brief,ğŸ”½an example from the sutra,ğŸ”½unmixed, recited in order,

original: mdor bsdus tshigs bcad gsal ba dang // mdo yis dper brjod bgyis pa dang // ma 'dres rim pas 'don pa dang // mthar sdod tshogs nyid yon tan yin //
analyzed: mdor bsdus tshigs bcad gsal ba dang // mdo yis dper brjod bgyis pa dang // ma 'dres rim pas 'don pa dang // mthar sdod tshogs nyid yon tan yin //
translated: and finally, the collection itself.

original: tshigs bcad ni rkang bzhi can no //
analyzed: tshigs bcad ni rkang bzhi can no //
translated: A verse has four lines.

original: gang gi rkang pa bzhi dang bcas pa de ni rkang bzhi can no //
analyzed: gang gi rkang pa bzhi dang bcas pa de ni rkang bzhi can no //
translated: That which has four lines is one with four lines.

original: rkang pa bzhi rnams kyi rkang ba'i sgra'am /
analyzed: rkang pa bzhi rnams kyi rkang ba'i sgra'am /
translated: The word line refers to the four lines,

original: rkang pa'i don kun sdud pa ni //
analyzed: rkang pa'i don kun sdud pa ni //
translated: or it includes the meaning of line.

original: rkang bzhi can te de ni tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rkang bzhi can te de ni tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya'o //
translated: One with four lines is called a verse.

original: de yang britta dang / dz'a ti'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: de yang britta dang / dz'a ti'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: And that is of two types, divided into brÄ«tti and jÄti.

original: britta dang dz'a te zhes pa'i dbye ba 'dis tshigs su bcad pa de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½yi ge bgrang ba @361b britta yin //
analyzed: britta dang dz'a te zhes pa'i dbye ba 'dis tshigs su bcad pa de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro // yi ge bgrang ba @361b britta yin //
translated: The verse is of two types according to the distinction of bhrÄ«ti and jÄti.ğŸ”½BhrÄ«ti is counting syllables.

original: bgrang ba ni brtsi ba ste gang gi grangs yi ges yin pa de ni britta ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bgrang ba ni brtsi ba ste gang gi grangs yi ges yin pa de ni britta ru 'gyur ro //
translated: Counting is enumeration. That which is counted by syllables is bhrÄ«ti.

original: phyi mo bgrang ba dz'a ti yin //
analyzed: phyi mo bgrang ba dz'a ti yin //
translated: JÄti is counting morae.

original: gang gi grangs phyi mos yin pa de ni dz'a ti ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi grangs phyi mos yin pa de ni dz'a ti ru 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is counted by morae is jÄti.

original: gang yi ge re re ba'ang gsal bar 'don par byed pa de ni dbyangs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang yi ge re re ba'ang gsal bar 'don par byed pa de ni dbyangs zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is pronounced with each syllable distinct is called vá¹›tti.

original: de ni mdor bsdu na thung du dang ring po dang plu ta ste rnam pa gsum yin no //
analyzed: de ni mdor bsdu na thung du dang ring po dang plu ta ste rnam pa gsum yin no //
translated: In brief, it is of three types: short, long, and pluta.

original: de la thung du ni phyi mo gcig pa ste /
analyzed: de la thung du ni phyi mo gcig pa ste /
translated: Among them, short is one mora.

original: de yang / aa ai au ri li rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: de yang / aa ai au ri li rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: It is of five types: a, i, u, r, and l.

original: ring po ni phyi mo gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: ring po ni phyi mo gnyis pa ste /

original: de ni / a'a a'i a'u r'i ae aee ao aoo rnam pa brgyad do //
analyzed: de ni / a'a a'i a'u r'i ae aee ao aoo rnam pa brgyad do //
translated: It is of eight types: Ä, Ä«, Å«, á¹›, á¹, á¸·, ai, and au.

original: plu ta ni phyi mo gsum pa ste /
analyzed: plu ta ni phyi mo gsum pa ste /
translated: Pluta is three moras.

original: de ni rnam pa dgu yin te /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa dgu yin te /
translated: It is of nine types:

original: ji ltar ring po brgyad bris pa de lta bu'i mthar plu ta brgyad rnams dang ; dgu pa li yig rkyang pa la gsum yig gis phye ba rnams so //
analyzed: ji ltar ring po brgyad bris pa de lta bu'i mthar plu ta brgyad rnams dang ; dgu pa li yig rkyang pa la gsum yig gis phye ba rnams so //
translated: At the end of the eight long ones, there are eight pluta vowels, and the ninth is the vowel i divided into three by the visarga.

original: de lta bas na dbyangs rnams nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: de lta bas na dbyangs rnams nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: Thus there are twenty-two vowels.

analyzed: gang yi ge re re ba rnams gsal bar 'don par byed pa ma yin pa de ni gsal byed de /

original: ka la sogs pa nas ha'i mthar thug pa sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rjes su nga ro dang / rnam par gcad bya dang / lce rtsa can dang / mchu can te bzhi rnams dang sum cu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: ka la sogs pa nas ha'i mthar thug pa sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rjes su nga ro dang / rnam par gcad bya dang / lce rtsa can dang / mchu can te bzhi rnams dang sum cu rtsa bdun no //

analyzed: de lta bas na bstan bcos 'dir yi ge rnams ni lnga bcu rtsa dgu'o //

original: yi ge bgrang ba na dbyangs bgrang bar bya'i /
analyzed: yi ge bgrang ba na dbyangs bgrang bar bya'i /
translated: When one counts the phonemes, one counts the vowels,

original: gsal byed rnams ni ma yin no //

original: yang 'dir tshigs su bcad par gyur na /

translated: The others should be understood in the same way.

original: dza ru 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: dza ru 'dod pa ste /

analyzed: dza'i ming can zhes bya bar 'dod do //

original: ra dbus yang /

analyzed: dbus ma yang ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de ra ru 'dod pa ste ra zhes bya bar 'dod do //
